attributes.action: fund research for energy efficient measures to curb carbon emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request that the government takes a much more proactive approach to the deadly problem caused by carbon emissions.  In particular, fund research on cheap green energy, home insulation, green fuels for cars and providing scientific information about climate change to all houses in the country as well as practical advice on how to curb emissions.
